data.title: Amazon stock surges 13% after Q3 beat: revenue $180.2B up 13% YoY, EPS hits $1.95
data.description:
Amazon’s stock price jumped more than 13% in after-hours trading on Thursday after the company reported third-quarter results that beat every Wall Street projection. The company posted $180. 2 billion in revenue, up 13% year over year, and $1. 95 earnings per share, crushing the $1. 57 EPS analysts were expecting, and investors responded immediately. Amazon Web Services, […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/amazon-stock-surges-13-after-q3-beat/

data.title: Strategy’s Q3 profit drops to $2.8 billion as bitcoin rally fades, mNAV premium hits 18-month low
data.description:
Strategy’s bitcoin accumulation slowed for a third straight quarter as weaker market premiums made new issuance less accretive.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/377038/strategy-q3-profit-drops-bitcoin-rally-fades-mnav-premium-compresses?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Saylor’s Strategy snaps back to profit with $2.8 billion Q3 revenue on Bitcoin rally
data.description:
Strategy, trading on Nasdaq under several tickers including STRF, STRC, STRK, STRD, and MSTR, has finally snapped back into profit. The company, which calls itself the world’s first Bitcoin Treasury Company, posted net income of $2. 8 billion for the third quarter ending September 30. The profit came after a brutal 2024 when Strategy recorded steep […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/saylors-strategy-snaps-back-to-profit/

data.title: Ethereum (ETH) Flips Bitcoin (BTC) in Futures Activity on CME
data.description:
The number of unsettled contracts opened on the Ethereum derivatives market on CME has reached 53,183 as of October 28, outshining Bitcoin’s futures activities on the platform.
source: https://u.today/ethereum-eth-flips-bitcoin-btc-in-futures-activity-on-cme

data.title: Apple’s Q4 revenue beats at $102.5 billion (+8% YoY), but China revenue drops to $14.49 billion
data.description:
Apple smashed past Wall Street’s estimates in its fiscal fourth quarter with $102. 47 billion in revenue, marking an 8% jump from the same period last year. The company also delivered $1. 85 in earnings per share, beating the expected $1. 77. But the China region didn’t play along. Sales from Greater China, which includes mainland China, Hong […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/apples-q4-revenue-beats-at-102-5-billion/

data.title: ETH Selloff Meets Late Bounce as Volume Climbs; Range Tightens as Risk Appetite Plunges
data.description:
The recent selloff in Ethereum (ETH) has encountered a late bounce as trading volume begins to rise. Meanwhile, the trading range for ETH is tightening, indicating a shift in market dynamics, particularly as risk appetite among investors has significantly diminished. This combination of factors suggests a complex market environment where traders are reacting to volatility, with some attempting to capitalize on the upward movement after the initial downturn, while others remain cautious in light of the shifting landscape of risk.
source: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/10/30/eth-selloff-meets-late-bounce-as-volume-climbs-range-tightens-as-risk-appetite-plunges

data.title: Coinbase posts $1.9 billion in Q3 revenue (up 58 % YoY) and buys 2,772 BTC
data.description:
Coinbase reported $1. 9 billion in Q3 revenue on Thursday, beating Wall Street estimates and recording a 58% year-over-year increase. The company’s earnings for the three-month period ending September 30 showed a 26% jump compared to the previous quarter. Analysts had predicted Coinbase would bring in $1. 8 billion, but the San Francisco-based exchange cleared that bar […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/coinbase-posts-1-9-billion-in-q3/
